dmca.title: ABC Action News wants copiers deactivated
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madam:

This letter is to serve as an official request to remove copyrighted material from Google's search engine listings and cache.

The copyrighted work in question includes the images and video links located at http://frank.masyada.com/index.cfm/fuseactionlhome.main/frank-masyada.cfm and http://masyada.com. The images and video used on those identical pages are clearly a news report generated by WFTS-TV, ABC Action News.

The work in question is returned via the following search operations:
Search query: frank masyada
Infringing web page: http://frank.masyada.com/index.cfm/fuseaction/home.main/frankmasyada.cfm
Search query: frank masyada abc
Infringing web page: http://masyada.com

Contact information of WFTS-TV agents:
[private], general manager WFTS-TV
[private], interactive media director, WFTS-TV [private]
Tampa, FL 33607
editor@wfts.com

Believed contact information of copyright violators: [private]
[private]
Tampa, FL 33615
[private]
[private]@hotmail.com

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above an the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

On behalf of WFTS-TV,
 
[private]
Interactive media director www.ABCactionnews.com
